trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A rather skittish Mord is at his wit's end and might be glad of a helping hand.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the wild beasts at Samiel's Backbone.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_01<tab>Aid the Mord.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_02<tab>Report to the skittish Mord.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_000<tab>You there! Kind traveler, strong traveler! The younglings are in danger!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_001<tab>Big, scary creatures! They looked hungry, too!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_002<tab>Please, you must hurry to Samiel's Backbone, east from here! Quickly, there is no time!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_010<tab>You do not know Samiel's Backbone!? Just go east, then!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_020<tab>Do not eat me! Mord fur very hard to swallow, I hear! Tickle your belly, it will!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_021<tab>Great samiel, we are truly sorry!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_030<tab>We are...not dead? Oh, you saved us, that is why! A thousand thousand thank-yous!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_040<tab>I never thought I would be so happy to not be dead! Many thanks, stranger!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_050<tab>I have never been eaten alive before, but I do not imagine it is very pleasant.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_051<tab>If you had not rescued us, we would be in the belly of a beast, and probably not in one piece, either.
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_060<tab>You did it! These two have a lot to answer for, though.

TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_061<tab>You see, those bones once belonged to a mighty samiel, whose ghost still roams the plains! A lot of silly younglings go there to prove their bravery. But there are things much more dangerous than wandering spirits, oh yes!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_062<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>wish<var 1A 01 /var> it was a ghost we had met instead of those horrible brutes! We will not be going back there any time soon!

TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_063<tab>Speak for yourself! I was hoping to meet the great samiel, so I want to try it again. And I will not have the others calling me a coward for running away!
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_064<tab>To tell the truth, I did exactly the same thing when I was their age. It is something of a tradition!

TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_065<tab>This is one of the ways we learn to fear and respect the desert, but also how we find the courage to face its many dangers. Though on this occasion, I think we would be two younglings short of a village were it not for you! Mord Souq thanks you, traveler!
